title: Elon Musk's xAI raises $20 billion in Nvidia-backed funding round
description: Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI announced Tuesday it has raised $20 billion in its latest funding round
content:
Elon Musk's artificial intelligence startup xAI announced Tuesday it has raised $20 billion in its latest funding round, surpassing its initial $15 billion target as the company accelerates development of its Grok AI models.

title: The Rise of Intelligent Greenhouses Using IoT, AI, and Robotics for Sustainable Farming
description: The review shows that smart greenhouses using IoT, artificial intelligence, and robotics can greatly improve crop yields, resource efficiency, and sustainability by enabling real-time monitoring, intelligent decision-making, and automation. However, widespread adoption is still limited by high costs, data gaps, and weak integration between these technologies, pointing to the need for simpler and more scalable solutions.
content: This review, produced by researchers from Sultan Qaboos University in Oman, spanning the Department of Soils, Water, and Agricultural Engineering, the Remote Sensing and GIS Research Center, and the Department of Mechanical and Industrial Engineering... [4275 chars]

title: Lenovo expands AI push with Nvidia tie-up, unveils Qira personal AI platform
description: Lenovo has announced a strategic partnership with Nvidia to speed up the deployment of AI data centres, alongside unveiling Qira, a personal AI platform designed to work across Lenovo and Motorola devices, as the company ramps up its artificial intelligence ambitions at CES in Las Vegas.
content: China’s Lenovo,, the world’s largest personal computer maker, on Tuesday said it has teamed up with U.S. AI chip leader Nvidia to help AI cloud providers quickly put data centres into operation, as it strives to establish itself in AI. The technology... [429 chars]

title: Elon Musk’s xAI closes $20 billion funding with Nvidia backing
description: The Qatar Investment Authority, Valour Equity Partners, Nvidia Corp., and other investors concluded a $20 billion investment round for Elon Musk's artificial intelligence business, xAI.
content: Wall Street bankers will be able to recover their investment by using the vehicle to purchase Nvidia processors, which xAI will then rent out for five years.The distinctive deal structure, supported by the GPUs rather than the company, might provide ... [2469 chars]

title: 'I Don't Use It...': Lionel Messi Explains Why He Doesn't Use ChatGPT And Speak Other Languages
description: In an interview with Luzu TV, Argentine footballing icon Lionel Messi admitted he doesn't use ChatGPT or artificial intelligence in general. When asked about whether or not he has gotten into the world of AI, Messi admitted he hasn't figured out how to utilise AI-driven chatbots, though he did clarify he is not against AI.
content:
In an interview with Luzu TV, Argentine footballing icon Lionel Messi admitted he doesn't use ChatGPT or artificial intelligence in general.

title: Elon Musk’s xAI raises $20 billion to expand data centers and research
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI has raised $20 billion from investors, a funding round that could value the company above $230 billion and deepen the intensifying race to build the world’s most powerful AI systems.
content:
The company said it would use the funding to “expand its decisive compute advantage” as it built data centers to power its technology and to “fuel groundbreaking research.”
The funding is part of a frenzy over AI companies, with investors plowing eno... [2116 chars]
